detail_desc: Top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with short sleeves and a flounce down the front.
Top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with short sleeves and a flounce down the front.
Top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with short sleeves and a flounce down the front.
Sleeveless dress in patterned jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Set with a top and skirt in soft jersey. Short-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Skirt with asymmetric tiers and an elastic waistband.
Wide, sleeveless, flared dress in a double layer of mesh with an opening and button at the back of the neck, seam at the hips and a wide, gathered flounce. Lined.
Wide, sleeveless, flared dress in a double layer of mesh with an opening and button at the back of the neck, seam at the hips and a wide, gathered flounce. Lined.
Short-sleeved tops in cotton jersey. Two printed tops and one in a solid colour.
3/4-length leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist. Legs with sewn-in creases down the front and a raw-edge flounce at the hems.

Cargo trousers in soft washed cotton twill with fake front pockets, real back pockets and flap leg pockets. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 1½-10Y), a fake fly and slim legs with short slits at the hems.

Cargo trousers in soft washed cotton twill with fake front pockets, real back pockets and flap leg pockets. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 1½-10Y), a fake fly and slim legs with short slits at the hems.

Cargo trousers in soft washed cotton twill with fake front pockets, real back pockets and flap leg pockets. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 1½-10Y), a fake fly and slim legs with short slits at the hems.
Treggings in soft, stretch cotton twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Treggings in soft, stretch cotton twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Treggings in soft, stretch cotton twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Treggings in soft, stretch cotton twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Short shorts in a textured cotton-blend weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, pleats at the top and detachable tie belt. Fly with a concealed zip and button, and side pockets.

Shorts in a viscose and cotton weave containing some linen with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Elastication at the back of the waist, pleats at the top, side pockets and short legs. Unlined.

Boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, a padded edge and a hook and loop fastening at the front. Lightly padded tongue that can easily be pulled forward to make it easier to put the boots on. Reflective details. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Knee-length shorts in waffled cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Regular fit.
Knee-length shorts in waffled cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Regular fit.
Knee-length shorts in waffled cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Regular fit.
Knee-length shorts in waffled cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Regular fit.
Padded all-in-one suit in narrow-wale organic cotton corduroy with a padded hood. Buttons at the top, concealed press-studs at the sides and long raglan sleeves. Organic cotton jersey lining.
ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a frill-trimmed V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top. Gathers at the shoulders, short, wide sleeves and a seam at the waist. Unlined.

Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a unique nursing feature. Round neck, opening and button at the back of the neck and a frilled seam at the waist. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a print motif and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a print motif and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a print motif and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Push-up body in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an opening with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.

Body in lace and mesh with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust for a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.

Body in lace and mesh with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust for a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Long-sleeved sports top in printed cotton jersey with side panels, ventilation holes in the armpits and slits at the sides of the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved sports top in printed cotton jersey with side panels, ventilation holes in the armpits and slits at the sides of the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined halterneck swimsuit in textured fabric with a V-neck and a plastic fastener at the back of the neck.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front, a loop at the back, fabric insoles and rubber soles.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front, a loop at the back, fabric insoles and rubber soles.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front, a loop at the back, fabric insoles and rubber soles.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front, a loop at the back, fabric insoles and rubber soles.
Cap in scuba fabric and mesh with a print motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with tie-top shoulder straps, decorative gathers at the front, a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Double layer at the top. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with tie-top shoulder straps, decorative gathers at the front, a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Double layer at the top. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with tie-top shoulder straps, decorative gathers at the front, a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Double layer at the top. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with tie-top shoulder straps, decorative gathers at the front, a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Double layer at the top. Unlined.

Short parka in a cotton weave with a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a pleat and press-stud. Drawstring at the waist and hem, a tab and press stud at the cuffs and a single back vent. Pile lining.

Short parka in a cotton weave with a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a pleat and press-stud. Drawstring at the waist and hem, a tab and press stud at the cuffs and a single back vent. Pile lining.

Short parka in a cotton weave with a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a pleat and press-stud. Drawstring at the waist and hem, a tab and press stud at the cuffs and a single back vent. Pile lining.

Short parka in a cotton weave with a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a pleat and press-stud. Drawstring at the waist and hem, a tab and press stud at the cuffs and a single back vent. Pile lining.

Short parka in a cotton weave with a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a pleat and press-stud. Drawstring at the waist and hem, a tab and press stud at the cuffs and a single back vent. Pile lining.

Short parka in a cotton weave with a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a pleat and press-stud. Drawstring at the waist and hem, a tab and press stud at the cuffs and a single back vent. Pile lining.

Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and an elasticated hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Checked shirt in twill made from a linen and cotton blend with a turn-down collar and classic front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Blouse in an airy pattern weave with a round neck, concealed button placket and pleat at the back. Long sleeves with flared cuffs and ties, and a gently rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Beret in soft, textured-knit cashmere.

Kaftan in a viscose crêpe weave with a gathered stand-up collar, opening with ties at the front, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Seam and a tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Hi-tops in imitation suede with an imitation leather heel cap and a zip at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles. Sole 3.5 cm.
Hi-tops in imitation suede with an imitation leather heel cap and a zip at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles. Sole 3.5 cm.
Checked cotton flannel shirt with frayed cut-off sleeves, a turn-down collar, classic front and chest pocket. Yoke with a hanger at the back, and a rounded hem.
Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details.
Long cardigan in transparent mesh with wide, 3/4-length sleeves, high slits in the sides and no fasteners.
Top in slub cotton jersey with short cap sleeves.

Sleeveless body in jersey containing glittery threads in a narrow cut at the top with an opening front and back. Small stand-up collar with hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck, and press-studs at the crotch.
Velour joggers with an elasticated waist and tapered legs with ribbed jersey hems.
Hipster briefs in lace with a high waist, lined gusset, wide sides with elastic crossover straps and medium coverage at the back. The briefs are made partly from recycled polyamide.
Hipster briefs in lace with a high waist, lined gusset, wide sides with elastic crossover straps and medium coverage at the back. The briefs are made partly from recycled polyamide.
Hipster briefs in lace with a high waist, lined gusset, wide sides with elastic crossover straps and medium coverage at the back. The briefs are made partly from recycled polyamide.

Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow elastic straps that cross at the front and adjustable shoulder straps. Fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow elastic straps that cross at the front and adjustable shoulder straps. Fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Glittery tulle skirt with an elastic waistband. Lined.
Glittery tulle skirt with an elastic waistband. Lined.
High-waisted, ankle-length trousers in a cotton weave with a detachable tie belt, side pockets, fake welt pockets with a button at the back, and wide legs.

Small handbag in imitation suede with a shoulder strap in metal chain and imitation leather, flap with a magnetic closure and decorative fastener, one outer compartment and an inner compartment. Lined. Size 5x15.5x20 cm.
All in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey with short sleeves, a button placket, and elasticated seam at the waist and short legs.
Pyjamas with a top and shorts in cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a print motif at the top. Shorts with an elasticated waist and small frill trims at the hems.
